moves.12... c6: Now we get away from the analyzed lines and have to think for ourselves.
moves.13. exf5: Material is less important than creating open lines.
moves.13... cxd5 14. Qd4 Rg8 15. Nxh7: Clearing the way for the QB.
moves.15... Bg7 16. Qxd5: Every move has to have an immediate threat.
moves.16... Rh8: An attempt to combine defense and attack.
moves.18. Bb5: Clears the way for the KR to join.
moves.22... Re8: Cuts off a flight square for the King.
